## useConstFn() function

Use a memorized function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useConstFn<T extends (...args: any) => any>(fn: T): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | T | The function to memorize. |

<b>Returns:</b>

T

Memorized function.
